text: Mowlana Zayn al-Dīn Abūbakr Tāybādi (in Persian: مولانا زین الدین ابوبکر تایبادی) (died 1389)http://taybadi.blogfa.com/page/taybadfarsi.aspx was an Iranian mystic and Sufi. His tombstone was built on an order by Pir Ahmad-e Khafi who was at the time Shahrukh Mirza's vizier.http://seeiran.ir/%D9%85%D8%B3%D8%AC%D8%AF-%D9%85%D9%88%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%A7/ == References == Category:Iranian Sufis Category:14th-century Iranian people
title: Zayn al-Din Taybadi
